benchmark_config.jira_title: Implement/Test API: PUT /1.0/kb/invoiceItems/{invoiceItemId}/customFields - Modify custom fields to invoice item

covered: PUT Valid Request scenarios (TC01) - successful update with required payload
Header coverage (TC02, TC03) - optional/required headers handling
Invalid input handling (TC06, TC08, TC11, TC14)
Large payload and performance considerations (TC12, TC20, TC21)
Error handling for server-related scenarios (TC15, TC16, TC19)
gaps: Partial Update scenario coverage (explicitly verifying and rejecting partial updates, if applicable) is not clearly tested
Concurrency/race condition scenarios beyond idempotency (no explicit concurrent/updating conflict tests)
Caching behavior testing (ETag/Cache-Control headers not covered)
Pagination concerns for listing/inventory-wide updates (not applicable to PUT on a single resource, but no pagination tests for any related endpoints)
recommendations: Add a dedicated partial update/concurrency test to ensure the API behaves correctly under concurrent updates or partial payloads if the API supports partial updates or should reject them.
Introduce tests for caching headers (ETag, Cache-Control) to verify client-side caching behavior.
Add rate limiting/throttling tests to validate behavior under high request volume.
If relevant, add pagination-related tests for endpoints that return paginated results or lists in conjunction with updates, ensuring no unintended data exposure during PUT operations.
